gbvision.models.shapes module¶

gbvision.models.shapes.circle_collision(center1, r1, center2, r2)¶
gbvision.models.shapes.convex_shape_collision(shape1, shape2)¶

detects collision between two convex shapes Note: if you are uncertain if a shape is convex, use convex_hull on it, it will make it convex :param shape1: the first shape, as a contour :param shape2: the second shape, as a contour :return:
